title: Druid Naki
paragraph: As the first type of units a player can recruit, the Druid Naki is a common used unit when starting the game. Druid Naki can be produced on the airship, the {{ grassland # article/fields/grassland }} and the {{ forest # article/fields/forest }}.

dynamicContents.content: The Druid Naki is effective against {{ Grass Spirit # article/units/grassSpirit }}, {{ Forest Spirit # article/units/forestSpirit }} and {{ Elder Spirit # article/units/elderSpirits }}.

The effectiveness of Druid Nakis against Grass and Forest Spirits makes them a great starter unit to capture {{ grassland # article/fields/grassland }} and {{ forest # article/fields/forest }} fields. The balanced ratio of attack and defense as well as the relatively fast movement speed makes the unit suitable for many situations.

The Druid Naki is weak against the early and mid game attacker units {{ Guard naki # article/units/guardNaki }} and {{ Nyxi # article/units/nyxi }} as well as the offensively used special units {{ Teryx # article/units/teryx }} and {{ Raider Naki # article/units/raider-naki }}. This makes the Druid Naki an unpopular choice for defending your fields.
Also the fact that the Druid Naki has a poor ratio between fight stats and  recruitment time makes them a very early game unit.
